title: How Kamala Harris' Ancestral Tamil Nadu Village Is Preparing For US Polls
content: The tiny village of Thulasemthirapuram in Tamil Nadu is praying for US Presidential Democratic candidate Kamala Harris' victory, strengthening her family's ancestral ties with the village dating back a century.
summary: The tiny village of Thulasemthirapuram in Tamil Nadu is praying for US Presidential Democratic candidate Kamala Harris' victory, strengthening her family's ancestral ties with the village dating back a century.

title: US Elections: When A Convict Ran An Entire Presidential Campaign From Jail
content: US Elections: In the 1920 US election, Eugene V. Debs, the Socialist Party presidential candidate, managed to secure nearly a million votes without ever stepping on the campaign trail.

title: Joe Rogan Endorses Donald Trump On Eve Of US Election

title: Bird Flu Detected In Pigs, Virologists Concerned
content: H5N1 bird flu-infected poultry found on a small American non-commercial farm. Although the pigs appeared to be healthy, a nasal swab from one of them was found to contain H5N1.

title: Who Will Win US Election 2024? AI Makes Stunning Predictions

title: Opinion: US Election: Trump Or Harris? Bigger Surprises Are In The Offing
